review: Visited the clinic for a root canal treatment. Dr kapil attended me and was very thorough with explaining the treatment to me. After a detailed examination the treatment was done by a specialist in Dr Kapils presence. The treatment was comfortable with minimal aftercare. Definitely recommend

Came with my nephew kabir who was just 1 year old when he had fallen off the bed and had bleeding and trauma to front tooth . Dr.Kapil checked him thoroughly and very calmly handled him . overall a very good experience and on  top of it the clinic   is very kid friendly ...would definitely come again
